AssociateIpGroups.name: AssociateIpGroups
AssociateIpGroups.description: Associates the specified IP access control group with the specified directory.

AuthorizeIpRules.name: AuthorizeIpRules
AuthorizeIpRules.description: Adds one or more rules to the specified IP access control group.

CreateIpGroup.name: CreateIpGroup
CreateIpGroup.description: Creates an IP access control group.

DeleteIpGroup.name: DeleteIpGroup
DeleteIpGroup.description: Deletes the specified IP access control group.

DescribeAccount.name: DescribeAccount
DescribeAccount.description:
Retrieves a list that describes the configuration of bring your own license (BYOL)
                                                for the specified account.

DescribeAccountModifications.name: DescribeAccountModifications
DescribeAccountModifications.description:
Retrieves a list that describes modifications to the configuration of bring your own
                                                license (BYOL) for the specified account.

DescribeClientProperties.name: DescribeClientProperties
DescribeClientProperties.description: Describe client properties about the specified resources.

DescribeIpGroups.name: DescribeIpGroups
DescribeIpGroups.description: Retrieves information about the IP access control groups of your account in the region.

DescribeWorkspaceBundles.name: DescribeWorkspaceBundles
DescribeWorkspaceBundles.description:
Obtains information about the WorkSpace bundles that are available to your account
                                                in the specified region.

DescribeWorkspaceDirectories.name: DescribeWorkspaceDirectories
DescribeWorkspaceDirectories.description:
Retrieves information about the AWS Directory Service directories in the region that
                                                are registered with Amazon WorkSpaces and are available to your account.

DescribeWorkspaceImages.name: DescribeWorkspaceImages
DescribeWorkspaceImages.description: Retrieves a list that describes one or more specified images.

DescribeWorkspaces.name: DescribeWorkspaces
DescribeWorkspaces.description: Obtains information about the specified WorkSpaces.

DescribeWorkspacesConnectionStatus.name: DescribeWorkspacesConnectionStatus
DescribeWorkspacesConnectionStatus.description: Describes the connection status of a specified WorkSpace.

DisassociateIpGroups.name: DisassociateIpGroups
DisassociateIpGroups.description: Disassociates the specified IP access control group from the specified directory.

ImportWorkspaceImage.name: ImportWorkspaceImage
ImportWorkspaceImage.description: Import a licensed EC2 image to into Amazon WorkSpaces.

ListAvailableManagementCidrRanges.name: ListAvailableManagementCidrRanges
ListAvailableManagementCidrRanges.description: List available CIDR ranges for a CIDR range constraint.

ModifyAccount.name: ModifyAccount
ModifyAccount.description: Modify the configuration of bring your own license (BYOL) for the specified account.

ModifyClientProperties.name: ModifyClientProperties
ModifyClientProperties.description: Modify the client properties of a specified resource.

ModifyWorkspaceProperties.name: ModifyWorkspaceProperties
ModifyWorkspaceProperties.description: Modifies the WorkSpace properties, including the running mode and AutoStop time.

ModifyWorkspaceState.name: ModifyWorkspaceState
ModifyWorkspaceState.description: Modify the state of specified WorkSpaces.

RevokeIpRules.name: RevokeIpRules
RevokeIpRules.description: Removes one or more rules from the specified IP access control group.

UpdateRulesOfIpGroup.name: UpdateRulesOfIpGroup
UpdateRulesOfIpGroup.description:
Replaces the current rules of the specified IP access control group with the specified
                                                rules.
